instructions: Put the plate on the charger
Place the napkin on the plate
Place the dinner fork to the left of the charger with its prong facing upwards
Place the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork with its prong facing upwards
Place the dinner knife to the right of the charger with its blade facing upwards
Place the tea spoon to the right of the dinner knife with its bowl facing upwards
Place the soup spoon to the right of the tea spoon with its bowl facing upwards
Place the water glass above the dinner knife
Place the wine glass to the right of the water glass and above the soup spoon
Place another wine glass between the wine glass and the soup spoon
Place the coffee cup to the right of, and above the soup spoon
Place the bread plate above the dinner and salad forks
Place the butter knife horizontally on the bread plate with its bowl facing right.
Place the dessert fork horizontally between the bread plate and the water glass
Place the dessert spoon horizontally below the dessert fork.
